page.title: 09PARISH COUNCIL
page.content:
The Parish Council has lots of responsibilities.It is responsible for the alotments up Sheepstead Road and Parkside.It is also responsible for two pieces of land down Mill Road.It is responsible for the upkeep of the churchyard and burials ground. It is responsible for the two footpaths and the village. All planning permision must go through the Parish Council. Every so often they organise litter blitzes and tree planting days
The clerk to the council is Mrs Denton. She has to type letters, look after the books and records.
There are eight parish councillors. They are elected every four years.
